Uses of TaskRecurrencePattern in com.independentsoft.exchange
 

Classes in com.independentsoft.exchange that implement TaskRecurrencePattern
 class AbsoluteMonthlyRecurrencePattern
          Represents a monthly recurrence pattern.
 class AbsoluteYearlyRecurrencePattern
          Represents a yearly recurrence pattern.
 class DailyRecurrencePattern
          Describes the frequency, in days, in which a calendar item or a task recurs.
 class DailyRegeneratingPattern
          Describes the frequency, in days, in which a task is regenerated.
 class MonthlyRegeneratingPattern
          Describes the frequency, in months, of which task is regenerated.
 class RelativeMonthlyRecurrencePattern
          Describes a relative monthly recurrence pattern.
 class RelativeYearlyRecurrencePattern
          Describes a relative yearly recurrence pattern.
 class WeeklyRecurrencePattern
          Describes a weekly recurrence pattern.
 class WeeklyRegeneratingPattern
          Describes the frequency, in weeks, in which a task is regenerated.
 class YearlyRegeneratingPattern
          Describes the frequency, in years, in which a task is regenerated.
 

Methods in com.independentsoft.exchange that return TaskRecurrencePattern

          Gets the Recurrence pattern for the Task.
